line.comment: * This signal triggers when undock, but NOT when dock.
* Note: [ACTION_LEAVE_HYPERSPACE] doesn't take jumping into account, only gates ([ACTION_LEAVE_GATE] is useless in this signal). When undocking, no action are set during this signal.
* === [THIS] is going from one sector to another. ===
* fight1: Xenons reveal themselves when [PLAYERSHIP] or a fleet leader arrives.
* Mission Generation is no longer done when a player enters a system. New missions are strictly created from Mayhem.Monitor.Missions.xml, which is a task.
* Here, we cleanup expired non-accepted missions, which is also done when the player reviews the Mission Board, so there may be expired missions but the player will never see them.
* Make the mission easier by displaying a message in the artefacts sector on arrival.
* Add-Ons 1.4.13: Decided to remove this tutorial from insane mode.
* Add an alert if it's a military huge ship.
* fight1: the Xenons can also appear in the same sector the player received the mission.
* fight1: Xenons reveal themselves when [PLAYERSHIP] arrives.

sval.val: This signal triggers when undock, but NOT when dock.
Note: [ACTION_LEAVE_HYPERSPACE] doesn't take jumping into account, only gates ([ACTION_LEAVE_GATE] is useless in this signal). When undocking, no action are set during this signal.
=== [THIS] is going from one sector to another. ===
fight1: Xenons reveal themselves when [PLAYERSHIP] or a fleet leader arrives.
Mission Generation is no longer done when a player enters a system. New missions are strictly created from Mayhem.Monitor.Missions.xml, which is a task.
Here, we cleanup expired non-accepted missions, which is also done when the player reviews the Mission Board, so there may be expired missions but the player will never see them.
Make the mission easier by displaying a message in the artefacts sector on arrival.
Add-Ons 1.4.13: Decided to remove this tutorial from insane mode.
Add an alert if it's a military huge ship.
fight1: the Xenons can also appear in the same sector the player received the mission.
fight1: Xenons reveal themselves when [PLAYERSHIP] arrives.
